thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com | 2 of 95
thread.title: Michelle Gregory
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Michelle Gregory

author: Michelle Gregory
title: Michelle Gregory
text: Initially my item was slightly wrong when it arrived, but when I informed the company they contacted me straight away to say they would send a new garment. The next day I received the baby grow which was exactly how I wanted it. Great customer service, I would definitely recommend.
